publicationStmt.p: Shared among digital edition projects, available on demand.

sourceDesc.p: Born digital: created by RRDT, expanded by Elisabetta Magnanti.

encodingDesc.p:
Character and glyph information derived from the following projects:
Digital Vercelli Book [Old English]
Peterborough Chronicle [Old English, Latin]
Vita di San Teobaldo [Latin]
Leges Langobardorum [Latin]
NB: elements are loosely included in OE / Latin sections according to a "first needed, first added" principle, i.e. a character may have been added for the purposes of an OE-related project therefore it is included in the OE section, but of course it may be needed for a Latin text as well.

revisionDesc.change: Started enlarging thanks to new characters needed by the "Manoscritti preziosi del Piemonte" project.
Minor corrections, moved to proper TEI 4.4.0 encoding of character properties
